predicate.note: Frames file for flash' based on sentences in the financial subcorpus. No comparison.

example.name: transitive
example.text: At the State University of New York at Brooklyn , researchers flash two groups of different letters on a computer screen in front of human guinea pigs .
example.arg: At the State University of New York at Brooklyn
a computer screen in front of human guinea pigs

example.name: intransitive
example.text: One protest did get past NASA 's guard , though ; a computer virus caused anti-Galileo messages to flash onto some computer screens at NASA centers .

example.name: transitive
example.text: Then , [*-1] flashing a diamond ring as big as the Ritz ( `` my day diamond , darling '' ) , she told her two companions that she is on the `` board '' of the Vatican Museum in Rome .
example.arg: a diamond ring as big as the Ritz ( `` my day diamond , darling '' )

example.name: intransitive
example.text: The Bronx also figures in Bruce Jay Friedman 's latest novel , which [*T*-1] flashes back to the New York of the '50s .
example.arg: [*T*-1] -> which -> Bruce Jay Friedman 's latest novel
